messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go
Maybe there should be a test that automatically checks these too.

On 2012/03/08 11:30:05, adg wrote:
> On 8 March 2012 22:28, David Symonds <mailto:dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> > Maybe there should be a test that automatically checks these too.
> 
> Maybe. There's an error when you run godoc.
Sorry about this. My godoc runs as background program, so I didn't
notice the error. I will avoid this by rerun godoc each time I change
the docs.

On 8 March 2012 22:28, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> Maybe there should be a test that automatically checks these too.

Maybe. There's an error when you run godoc.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ea632887b22a ***

doc: fix metadata in go_mem.html

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5781053

subject: code review 5781053: doc: fix metadata in go_mem.html
